Peyami, I am not your enemy here.
 I would never do something to hurt you on purpose.

Peyami, tôi không phải kẻ thù.
 Tôi sẽ không làm gì hại đến cậu.

en: Tamam, evet. Yemekte biraz abarttık, şımardık.

Okay? It's over and done.

Nhé? Xong chuyện.
 Nhưng tôi thề với cậu.

I would choose to have yours!
 Really.

pa: He's not spineless, you know?
I'm serious, Peyami.

You know I'll do it.

pa: But I meant what I said.

en: Sen benim şu hayattaki en hakiki dostumsun
pa: You are the only… the only true friend I have,

en: Biz boşuna kan kardeşi olduk? Ha?
pa:
Why are you and I even blood brothers?
 Huh?

Come on.
 And don't ever tell me to fuck off for no reason again.

Because I fuck hard!
 You know that.

That's the ugliest thing I've ever seen.

pa: Just great.

Peyami.
vi: Peyami.

pa: you need to pull yourself together.

pa: Deal?

Hey.

- Bác cùng lõm bõm không? - Không.

He can't do that.
 -Don't you wanna go swish swish? -No swish swish.

Để bác ấy không bị ám ảnh.

But you promised! You said we would have fun, and you tricked me!

Firu hứa sẽ chơi rồi. Firu lừa.

Bố Mustafa, đừng buồn.

Well, I'm sorry to break it to you, Papa Mustafa.
 -You can't have her, don't forget it. -Oh, but Firu and I got marr--

You got that right. It's hard.

Tìm kiểu gì nhỉ?

Nghe này, nếu cậu muốn
 thì Esvet quay lại đây làm cũng được.

Hello.
